channel.title: 718 spawning npc help
channel.description: Where do i spawn npcs in a 718 Matrix source?

item.title: 718 spawning npc help
item.dc:creator: @Yozora Yozora
item.description:
@Yozora wrote:

Make sure to delete the packedNPC folder. It will automatically repack the NPCs with the updated version of the unpackedNPCs.txt…

Read full topic

item.title: 718 spawning npc help
item.dc:creator: @nikolaww3 nikolaww3
item.description:
@nikolaww3 wrote:

[quote=“DannyIsSoPro, post:2, topic:449577”]It’s the same process as the 667/711 Matrix servers.

Your server folder>data>npcs>unpackedSpawnsList.txt
Put the NPC’s you would like to spawn in that text file and follow the format in order to spawn the NPC correctly, and to avoid errors. Make sure you delete/backup your packetSpawns folder though.[/quote]Didn’t work! I got no errors but the npc didn’t spawn!

Read full topic

item.title: 718 spawning npc help
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

It’s the same process as the 667/711 Matrix servers.

Your server folder>data>npcs>unpackedSpawnsList.txt
Put the NPC’s you would like to spawn in that text file and follow the format in order to spawn the NPC correctly, and to avoid errors. Make sure you delete/backup your packetSpawns folder though.

Read full topic
